tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Braces Fixing, Tooth Extraction, fixed retainers,
review: I had a seamless experience with Dr. Sowjanya and Dr. Soumya. My goal was to have an extra tooth removed and improve the appearance of my other teeth. After reading reviews in the Manikonda and Raidurgam area, I decided to visit Clips and Dentals for the procedure. From start to finish, the appointment booking and treatment process went exceptionally well. I went ahead with tooth extraction and put braces with having recurring followups. Finally, After the doctor explained me the requirements of a retainer, i chose to go ahead with fixed retainers. The doctors were extremely supportive and provided clear explanations of the issues I had and the available solutions.

tags: Value for money,
review: I was briefed in a clear manner about the entire process by Dr Sowjanya A. Godavarthi. Whenever she checked me, she inquired about my dental condition and braces experience. That shows that she was concerned. Given my limited interactions with her during the appointment visits, I have shared my review about initial interactions with her. However, I'm satisfied with the way my teeth look now and I'm grateful for the experience. Based on my experience in visiting the clinic, I've noticed that if the receptionist would reduce calling me so frequently, it would be less stressful for me.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback khairunnisa. Hope to serve you better in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Sowjanya and her team are well experienced, have good patience to hear the problem, analyse it and explain the best treatment opportunities available. Undergone root canal treatment 6 months ago. Appointments, treatment and follow up was very good. Thankyou doctor :)
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback . Hope to serve you better

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I’m so glad I got my dental treatment under the expert & careful guidance of Dr.Sowjanya. Before consulting her, my teeth & gums were in a horrible state due to years of negligence & a botched bridge work. 
Dr.Sowjanya worked a comprehensive treatment to improve the health, longevity & esthetics of my teeth & gums. She carefully evaluated every aspect there is, put forward a plan & explained in detail & executed each step with expertise. The end results could not be better considering the options I was given by other doctors in the area.
I’d highly recommend Dr.Sowjanya for your dental treatments, no matter how big or small they are & be rest assured you’ll get the best advise & treatment there is.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been suffering from dental issues due to flurosis and despite brushing twise. I consulted clips and implants in 2021 and Dr Sowjanya Godavarthi garu explained the treatment. I have undergone scaling, filling of cavities and cap of disfigured teeth. Dr. Sowjanya garu was very kind, excellent and I have improved my oral condition. Dr. Sowjanya garu was very kind and the guidance is followed by me. Recently I underwent oral design with zirconia crown and I am indebted to you on Dr. Sowjanya garu for the excellent treatment and guidance. May God bless Dr. Sowjanya garu every success and prosperity and more laurels.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback. Hope to serve you better .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I had visited partha dental they had recommended 4 RCTs. I came here for 2nd opinion. This doctor said no RCTs are required. I required orthodontic treatment. That saved my 4 teeth. She did very good treatment for my mother's tooth infection. She's happy with her treatment. I got zirconia cap fitted by her. I got that cap from partha dental. They didn't fit it properly. It came out twice within 2 months. I got that same cap fitted by her. Now it's one year and that cap didn't come out.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I am very happy with the outcome of the treatment at this clinic, I had fractured front tooth, the cap I received is very esthetic it blended with my adjacent natural teeth. I thank Dr Sowjanya for restoring my smile back. I would highly recommend Clips & Implants dental clinic the Doctors here are very good  and the staff is helpful
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback
